front.title: RTP Payload Format for ISO/IEC 21122 (JPEG XS)

abstract.t: This document specifies a Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) payload format to be used for transporting ISO/IEC 21122 (JPEG XS) encoded video. ISO/IEC 21122 (JPEG XS) is a low-latency, lightweight image coding system allowing for an increased resolution and frame rate, while offering visually lossless quality with reduced amount of ressources such as power and bandwidth.
